name.title: Name
name.description: Unique name for the custom api

friendlyName.title: Friendly Name
friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the custom api

description.title: Description
description.description: Optional description of the custom api

executePrivilegeName.title: Execute Privilege Name
executePrivilegeName.description: Name of the privilege that allows execution of the custom API, e.g. prvCreateContact

isFunction.title: Is Function
isFunction.description: Controls whether the API is a Function (true) or an Action (false)

isPrivate.title: Is Private
isPrivate.description: Hides the API from appearing within the $metadata service document and indicates it should not be used by other developers

allowedCustomProcessingStepName.title: Allowed Custom Processing Step Name
allowedCustomProcessingStepName.description: Async Only, Sync and Async, or None

bindingType.title: Binding Type
bindingType.description: Global (doesn't applying to a specific entity/table), Entity (accepts a single record), or EntityCollection (applies to or returns results of a specific entity/table)

requestParameters.title: Request Parameters
requestParameters.description: Array of parameters accepted in the API request call

responseProperties.title: Response Properties
responseProperties.description: Array of attributes returned by the API response
